messages.content: As someone who has grown up in Scarborough & Whitby, has been educated at local schools and who now runs a business here, I feel a deep connection with this area and the people who live here. We must reject the Tory narrative of austerity and decline. I believe we can do so much better with a Labour government that is committed to investing in the North and a local MP who truly understands the needs of this area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to protecting and supporting the National Health Service.
Focus on generating employment opportunities in environmentally sustainable industries.
Addressing issues related to housing and ensuring adequate housing solutions.
Creating and enhancing prospects for the youth in education, employment, and support.

issues.education: Opportunities for Young People: Creating and enhancing prospects for the youth in education, employment, and support.
issues.environment: Creating Green Jobs: Focus on generating employment opportunities in environmentally sustainable industries.
issues.health: Defending our NHS: Commitment to protecting and supporting the National Health Service.

community.content: Fixing Our Broken Housing: Addressing issues related to housing and ensuring adequate housing solutions.

Strong local representation for Scarborough & Whitby
